Articles.Content:
Ive been browsing the interwebs as per normal fashion, when i came across this little beauty of a Gem.

http://en.spaceengine.org/

a very indepth little space sim that would do WONDERS for getting us new planets and maybe...new galaxies

It is a very cool sim, I agree. However, we are already getting new planet and we would need other solar systems before getting a galaxy!

Further, even if the makers of that sim allowed it, I imagine there would be nothing simple about merging them together.
Ehh true...but still...would be a mighty fine little addition...id love to go visit Andromeda
